name: Music Commands
desc: These commands are strictly for Charmy admins.

commands.name: .join
commands.desc: This will make Charmy join the current voice channel you're in.

commands.name: .play [path]
commands.desc: This will play the audio file at the given path. [!WARNING!]: This feature is only working with files saved to the Charmy Database. This will support urls in the future.

commands.name: .stop
commands.desc: Disconnects Charmy from your voice channel.
